title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) and no busy cursor is shown.
EB: The software should display a busy cursor when updating the checked state of the table to indicate that a process is ongoing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the table where the checkboxes are displayed.
3. Start updating the checked state of the checkboxes.
4. Observe that it takes a long time for the updates to complete and that no busy cursor is shown during this process.
